verbs.description: NEW YORK ( AP ) — President Donald Trump [V: is] distancing himself from Michael Cohen amid an FBI investigation into his longtime personal lawyer 's business dealings .

NEW YORK ( AP ) — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: distancing] [ARG1: himself] [ARG2: from Michael Cohen] [ARGM-LOC: amid an FBI investigation into his longtime personal lawyer 's business dealings] .
